thread.title: Keri Giannotti NJVVMF
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Keri Giannotti NJVVMF

author: Keri Giannotti NJVVMF
title: Keri Giannotti NJVVMF
text: Vanessa was our service representative and she was great. She would get back to emails and phone calls right away. We are so excited about the look of our flash drive. We went with the credit card like one, with our memorial on the front. It is a stunning project and fantastic as part of our marketing program. We will most certainly use them again. We cannot say enough good things about flash bay and their products
